snippet: GLAAD, a group that advocates for diversity in the media, reviewed the scripted shows for this season, and determined that there are more gay and lesbian characters on television than ever before.
abstract: GLAAD, a group that advocates for diversity in the media, reviewed the scripted shows for this season, and determined that there are more gay and lesbian characters on television than ever before.

headline.main: Group Finds More Gay and Lesbian Characters on Television
headline.print_headline: More Gay Men and Lesbians Appear in Network Shows

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Gay and Lesbian Alliance Against Defamation
